name: Veers
card_set: Empire Strikes Back Introductory Two Player Game
Lore: 'General of the AT-AT assault armor division sent by Darth Vader to crush the Rebellion on Hoth. Cold and ruthless.',
Text: 'Must deploy on Hoth, but may move elsewhere. May not be deployed if three or more of opponent''s unique ( •) characters on table. Snowtroopers at same site are forfeit +1.',
